message.content: {"given_definition_quality":70,"better_definition":"to hear; to hear something","sentence":"我听到水。","image_prompt":"Draw a soft apocalypse animation style image of a small child cupping their ear and hearing the sound of water flowing nearby. In the background, the environment shows subtle signs of decay, with plants overgrowing broken urban structures, but the scene feels gentle and quiet. Focus on the child's attentive expression as they listen to the gentle stream.","sentence_translation":"I hear water."}
